author: 0xunclebill
content: in the local building case, the bid signature should be `bls.G2_POINT_AT_INFINITY`. I assume the same should be for the payload envelope?

author: 0xunclebill
content: Does anyone else feel that theres a bit of context missing for payload envelope construction in the local block building case? I can open a PR if that would be helpful

author: nc1234
content: No, the reason why bid signature can be G2 is because the proposer already signs the block which includes the bid. Execution payload envelope is broadcasted separately so proposer needs to sign it or it can be forged.

author: nc1234
content: You can see `verify_execution_payload_envelope_signature` has signature verification for self build
